solution_line_template: Dustin reads {dustin_pages_per_minute} pages a minute because {dustin_pages_per_hour} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{dustin_pages_per_hour}/{minutes_per_hour}={dustin_pages_per_minute}>>{dustin_pages_per_minute}

Dustin reads {dustin_total_pages} pages in {reading_time_minutes} minutes because {reading_time_minutes} x {dustin_pages_per_minute} = <<{reading_time_minutes}*{dustin_pages_per_minute}={dustin_total_pages}>>{dustin_total_pages}
Sam reads {sam_pages_per_minute} pages a minute because {sam_pages_per_hour} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{sam_pages_per_hour}/{minutes_per_hour}={sam_pages_per_minute}>>{sam_pages_per_minute}

Sam reads {sam_total_pages} pages in {reading_time_minutes} minutes because {reading_time_minutes} x {sam_pages_per_minute} = <<{reading_time_minutes}*{sam_pages_per_minute}={sam_total_pages}>>{sam_total_pages}
Dustin reads {page_difference} more pages than Sam because {dustin_total_pages} - {sam_total_pages} = <<{dustin_total_pages}-{sam_total_pages}={page_difference}>>{page_difference}
